Michael Cruz

Full Stack Web Developer

See My Work

What I Can Do

Here are a few of the things that I love and I can help you with

Front-End Development

Using Javascript with popular front-end MVC pattern frameworks like React and Angular, I specialize in architecting web applications utilizing CRUD operations that interact with back-end services using RESTful web services. I can also interact with popular APIs like Google Maps or Fitbit using the latest OAuth2 standards to allow communication between your website and other popular websites that people use everyday.

Full-Stack Development

Combining the front-end tools like React or Angular with back-end tools like Node.js and MongoDB/SQL, I can create a full-stack web application of any kind. Whether it's a simple static site or a complex Single Page App, you can be rest assured I will take your ideas and make them come to life.

Mobile Friendly Websites

I can make you a responsive website that can scale to any device leveraging the latest technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript along with frameworks like Bootstrap or Materialize. In today's marketplace, your users expect websites to work and look amazing whether they are on their mobile phones or their laptops.
